Sequence Information.Source: Bacillus amyloliquefaciens FZB42 & Bacillus pumilus (Bacillus mesentericus) (Gram-positive bacteria)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis HB0042, Bacillus subtilis strain 168, Bacillus megaterium 7A1, Bacillus anthracis (MIC=2-4 µg/ml), Bacillus brevis strain ATCC 8246, Bacillus cereus strain ATCC 14579 and strain CU1065, Bacillus licheniformis strain ATCC 9789, Micrococcus luteus, Bacillus sphaericus, Paenibacillus granivorans and Streptococcus pyogenes (MIC=128 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Peptide antibiotic inhibiting growth of Gram-positive bacteria

Literature.Title: Plantazolicin, a novel microcin B17/streptolysin S-like natural product from Bacillus amyloliquefaciens FZB42.
Literature.Author: Scholz R, Molohon KJ, Nachtigall J, Vater J, Markley AL, S¼ssmuth RD, Mitchell DA, Borriss R.
